TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDataObject

summary.span: Provides a format-independent mechanism for transferring data.

span.span: Provides a format-independent mechanism for transferring data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 介面由類別的資料傳輸作業，例如拖放。The interface is used by the class for data transfer operations like drag-and-drop. 當由類別，實作方法可讓單一資料物件，提供多種格式的資料。When implemented by a class, the methods enable a single data object to offer data in multiple formats. 提供多種格式的資料通常會讓資料可供更廣泛的應用程式比，如果只支援單一資料格式。Offering data in multiple formats tends to make the data usable by a wider variety of applications than if only a single data format were supported. 類別提供的基本實作介面。The class provides a basic implementation of the interface.

summary.span: Retrieves a data object in a specified data format.

span.span: Retrieves a data object in a specified data format.

param.span: A string that specifies what format to retrieve the data as.

span.span: A string that specifies what format to retrieve the data as.

param.span: See the class for a set of predefined data formats.

span.span: See the class for a set of predefined data formats.

summary.span: Retrieves a data object in a specified format; the data format is specified by a string.

span.span: Retrieves a data object in a specified format; the data format is specified by a string.

returns.span: A data object with the data in the specified format, or **null** if the data is not available in the specified format.

span.span: A data object with the data in the specified format, or **null** if the data is not available in the specified format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫**GetDataPresent**來判斷是否可以使用這個資料物件，然後再呼叫中指定的格式。Call **GetDataPresent** to determine whether a specified format is available in this data object before calling . 呼叫來取得這個資料物件中所提供的所有格式的清單。Call to obtain a list of all the formats that are available in this data object.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool GetDataPresent (string format, bool autoConvert);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool GetDataPresent(string format, bool autoConvert) cil managed
Public Function GetDataPresent (format As String, autoConvert As Boolean) As Boolean
public: bool GetDataPresent(System::String ^ format, bool autoConvert);
abstract member GetDataPresent : string * bool -> bool

param.name: format
param.span: A string that specifies what format to check for.

span.span: A string that specifies what format to check for.

param.span: See the class for a set of pre-defined data formats.

span.span: See the class for a set of pre-defined data formats.

param.name: autoConvert
param.span: to only check for the specified format; to also check whether or not data stored in this data object can be converted to the specified format.

span.span: to only check for the specified format; to also check whether or not data stored in this data object can be converted to the specified format.

summary.span: Checks to see whether the data is available in, or can be converted to, a specified format.

span.span: Checks to see whether the data is available in, or can be converted to, a specified format.

summary.span: A flag indicates whether to check if the data can be converted to the specified format, if it is not available in that format.

span.span: A flag indicates whether to check if the data can be converted to the specified format, if it is not available in that format.

returns.span: if the data is in, or can be converted to, the specified format; otherwise, .

span.span: if the data is in, or can be converted to, the specified format; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法的實作，請參閱。For an implementation of this method, see . 呼叫**GetDataPresent**來判斷是否可以使用這個資料物件，然後再呼叫中指定的格式。Call **GetDataPresent** to determine whether a specified format is available in this data object before calling . 呼叫來取得這個資料物件中所提供的所有格式的清單。Call to obtain a list of all the formats that are available in this data object. 這個方法會傳回 **，則為 true**時：This method returns **true** when: - *取得*參數是 **，則為 true**和資料位於指定的格式，或可轉換成指定的格式。The *autoConvert* parameter is **true** and the data is in the specified format, or it can be converted to the specified format. - *取得*參數是**false**且資料在指定的格式。The *autoConvert* parameter is **false** and the data is in the specified format. 這個方法會傳回**false**時：This method returns **false** when: - *取得*參數是 **，則為 true**和資料不適用於指定的格式，且無法轉換成指定的格式。The *autoConvert* parameter is **true** and the data is not available in the specified format and cannot be converted to the specified format. - *取得*參數是**false**，且不指定格式提供資料。The *autoConvert* parameter is **false**, and the data is not available in the specified format.
